postapoc.name: Post-apocalypse
description: Journey to Seattle to find a safe place to settle down.
It's 2007, and the bombs dropped exactly 2 weeks ago.
Find your way to Tennessee or die trying.

ut.name: Undead territory
description: It's like that one film, y'know, with Woody Harrelson?
ut.objective: Amusement Park in Los Angeles, California

ag.name: Lost Gun
description: Abandoned and left behind by your military group,
you need to find a way to get back to your base in Nevada.

chal:alr.name: Challenge: A Long Road
description: Normal post-apocalypse gameplay, except you're taking the scenic route.

chal:fam.name: Challenge: Famine
description: Before the bombs fucked everything up, famine was taking its toll on America.
As a result, there's less food along your route.
You better hope berries sound good right now.

chal:dgw.name: Challenge: Deal Gone Wrong
description: Apparently you pissed off a roaming bandit gang while in Tennessee.
Oh well. Looks like that trip to Cleveland is coming sooner than you thought.
